pageContext.claim: “I didn't say that [referring to comments Trump made on Fox News’s ‘Hannity’ that New York might not need 30,000 ventilators].”
pageContext.analysis: First, Trump suggested New York would not need as many ventilators as it was requesting. Then, Trump denied making those comments. He told Sean Hannity of Fox News, "A lot of equipment is being asked for that I don't think they will need.” At a news conference two days earlier, he said, "What we don't want is where we distribute the ventilators, like we did in New York and they didn't need them, or they didn't know, or they didn't use them."
